author: chedruid

text:
I don't really care for this song.  But, the Soul Edge / Calibur games have always had great music.  When it comes to Soul Edge, nothing is better than Bravely Folk Song.

Although, I really prefer the music from Soul Calibur III.  That game had so many epic stage themes.  Lost Cathedral is easily one of my favorite video game tracks ever made.

author: linty90

text: This game's intro FMV is still one of my most memorable. It helped that the game itself was also awesome and the start of one of the best fighting series. Apart from the chorus, I could really see this track playing while you're fighting in a Strategy RPG like FF Tactics. A Continental Gale is still one of my favorite themes ever in a fighting game (Best VGM 26).
